name: cis-backend
description: Serverless CRUD services exposing a REST HTTP interface

scripts.invoke-lambda-createActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_actionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/actions/data/create-actions.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-getActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_getActionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/actions/data/get-actions.json lambda-invoke-response-get.json && cat lambda-invoke-response-get.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-listActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_listActionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/actions/data/list-actions.json lambda-invoke-response-list.json && cat lambda-invoke-response-list.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-createUserActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_useractionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/userActions/data/create-useractions.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-getUserActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_getUserActionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/userActions/data/get-useractions.json lambda-invoke-response-get.json && cat lambda-invoke-response-get.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-listUserActions: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_listUserActionsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://components/userActions/data/list-useractions.json lambda-invoke-response-list.json && cat lambda-invoke-response-list.json
